admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
Executive Directors expressed support
            for the objectives of the operation, which aim to raise the
            effectiveness of public investment through better project
            selection, implementation, financial management and
            oversight. They noted that the operation is closely aligned
            with the Vietnam's socio-economic development strategy
            (2011-2020) and consistent with the Bank's country
            partnership strategy. Directors asked for further
            clarification on the status of the law on public investment
            and stressed the importance of its timely passage. They
            noted the strong analytical underpinnings of the operation
            and welcomed the collaboration between the Bank, development
            partners and the authorities.
